title: On the waves of the Adriatic
creator_contributor_role: Brian McKenzie Film Productions, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mentally handicapped
description: Melbourne filmmaker Brian McKenzie spent 5 years working on this engrossing study of a not-so-typical Brunswick household. McKenzie plays a central part as he documents the lifestyle of Graham (a youth in his 20's), his family and friends. After having spent so long with the family, McKenzie becomes part of the furniture- a situation which enables him to dig deep into the subjects' lives.
